032a9e79-4e67-4e22-b85f-6ba3b7c64992: The Arch-Militant deals +20% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} against targets that are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}.
0b494cea-4159-4e62-b274-8c3b87113957: (2 × Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g} bonus, whichever is higher)
0caa0bd4-d2aa-44d4-a1e6-497e6fad2781:
An Arch-Militant is a formidable master of warfare, able to blend various weapons and styles mid-combat. Be it {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g}, or anything in between — the Arch-Militant is the best at it, and becomes stronger and stronger with each second in battle.
Core focus: versatility, large {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}, personal buffs, weapon set rotation, crowd control.
1368cbb3-1f2b-47c8-bbb7-72447909361a: Every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the first single-target {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} used by an ally on the Arch-Militant grants +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g} to that ally.
18dc9416-7b7b-43d1-aac7-544507d718ae: The Arch-Militant suffers a −30 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}.
1af4e558-280e-4356-a62f-a953a63289da: The Arch-Militant gains a +2% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} for every stack of versatility. This bonus is kept when the Arch-Militant uses Cautious Approach or Confident Approach.
1d5640f8-3d7c-448f-9a9c-78570adadccd: The Arch-Militant's heavy weapon attacks cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g}.
1e3abd8d-795c-4222-b257-72f25f36b138: Any of the Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks and {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} reduce {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} of all the enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by −8% until the end of combat. Does not stack.
205545e4-ee7c-4396-a692-5dbe3c5b16d5: The cost of Wildfire is reduced by −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} for every 3 stacks of versatility instead of 4.
21a6f0ad-a8d8-418b-99d6-d37291533f68: Using Cautious Approach also grants the Arch-Militant {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to 10% of the Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The same happens at the start of every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} while the Arch-Militant remains under the effect of Cautious Approach.
26e3b35f-1657-485c-9912-ee129b5b7c9e: Targets of Kick must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|8c9f4b237a774e008c21e126a8b98746} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
290c4a45-21d4-4ef9-9c41-e88552e2d1c1: As long as the Arch-Militant has killed at least one enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Arch-Militant gains a +{uip|DodgeBonus|c3df77552dee4af28b2fb6c34078fcd6}% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.
2a711471-4d7c-4e70-9d2d-4dbd4435488d: Killing an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} makes all the Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} (min 1), and vice versa. Does not stack.
34e5aab9-8ec9-48df-bab1-d4dc3554f65c:
When the Arch-Militant attacks targets that have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} reduced by any effects applied by the Arch-Militant's allies, the Arch-Militant deals +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
When the Arch-Militant attacks targets that have their {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} reduced by any effects applied by the Arch-Militant's allies, the Arch-Militant deals +2 damage.
3b27fff4-79a0-473e-94c2-d91f5ca353b2:
The Arch-Militant immediately gains +{uip|MovementPoints|801926b855d64391b465b6d75796a19a} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
If the Arch-Militant has stacks of versatility, those stacks are doubled until the end of {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but the Arch-Militant loses all stacks that were added at the end of the turn.
42aabe24-2ff8-46ba-9ed5-24535e813a5e: The Arch-Militant begins combat with 2 stacks of versatility.
46d112d7-7064-46cc-84af-b7f20e203a79: Enemies that were forced to make a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} by the Arch-Militant will make any resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} from any source with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|1b460fbb306341c3b19992da7b15f108} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} until the end of combat .
4f1dbcd7-3662-4f65-938a-2a517faa6167: Devastating Attack also reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −7% and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} by −10 until the end of combat. Does not stack.
501e5c15-7194-40d1-a073-2b67fea7ae9b: The Arch-Militant can use both the {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} of the Arch-Militant {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} and the heroic act of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} or Soldier archetype in a single combat.
54f5e79c-df23-4e1a-ba04-a34ee395347d: Whenever the Arch-Militant or their ally uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}, the Arch-Militant gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for all attacks until the end of combat.
569901db-1951-40b6-aa5d-94b23b7239f5: The Arch-Militant gains the confident approach effect until the end of combat, or until this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used again, or until using Cautious Approach. Instead of the usual {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} from versatility, the Arch-Militant gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} and ignores 5% of enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} for every stack. All the Arch-Militant's attacks score {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g}, but the Arch-Militant's critical {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for those attacks is modified by −(50 − (critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} / 2))%. If the Arch-Militant already has 4 or more stacks of versatility, the Arch-Militant's attacks always deal maximum damage, as long as the Arch-Militant keeps the confident approach effect active.
5c914022-cc73-4560-9f6f-9b686a045371: The Arch-Militant gains a +3% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} for every stack of versatility. This bonus is kept when the Arch-Militant uses Cautious Approach or Confident Approach.
5eaff810-0339-40ed-ba6a-1b73cb654afb: Until the end of combat, the Arch-Militant can make one additional attack each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} (including one additional attack on the turn this {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} was used). The first attack after using this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} and each turn afterwards costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
64036471-080f-48c5-826e-a31de97fada4: The Arch-Militant deals +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to targets that have a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} (regardless of whether that target is the Arch-Militant or someone else).
7120794c-267b-4f9a-9705-85aa7875e2a1: Until the end of combat, the Arch-Militant's attacks don't spend all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. Additionally, each attack grants a stacking +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
859b6635-6f3d-472d-a50b-578882df54a6: Gaining a stack of versatility increases {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} by +10% until the end of {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.
897a4222-5431-4bcd-b5ae-eb8cc65db44f: The Arch-Militant gains the cautious approach effect until the end of combat, or until this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used again, or until using Confident Approach. Instead of the usual {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} from versatility, the Arch-Militant gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} for every stack. If the Arch-Militant already has 4 or more stacks of versatility, the Arch-Militant removes all {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects from themselves and becomes immune to these effects, as well as stun and {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, for as long as the Arch-Militant keeps the cautious approach effect active.
8ee62084-49c7-42dc-8cf3-8a4d2b5df1a9:
When the Arch-Militant attacks targets that have their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} reduced by any effects applied by the Arch-Militant's allies, the Arch-Militant gains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}.
When the Arch-Militant attacks targets that have their {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} reduced by ant effects applied by the Arch-Militant's allies, the Arch-Militant deals +20% critical {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
91d65f67-43a3-4c8b-a980-80d596958d18: Until the end of combat, the Arch-Militant can make one additional attack each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} (including one additional attack on the turn this {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} was used). The first attack after using this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} and each turn afterwards costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. The Arch-Militant suffers a −30 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} until the end of combat and suffers {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}. Bleeding: this creature is bleeding and suffers 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} at the start of its turn. The effect can be removed by any source of healing.
920c453b-ae7f-4b44-8f03-9517618647ae:
Whenever the Arch-Militant uses an attack that is of a different type from their previous attack, the Arch-Militant gains a stack of versatility. The types of attacks can be {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shot{/g}, single {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, area melee attack, area shot, or {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} shot.
The Arch-Militant gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} for every stack of versatility.
If the Arch-Militant has 4 or more stacks of versatility, the Arch-Militant deals an additional +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> or +<u>(BS bonus / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, whichever is highest.
92307861-6baa-4831-a9c0-7b3d6cfcfc16:
The Arch-Militant's next attack will cost 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, will not count toward the attack limit this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, and will grant a stack of versatility even if the attack type is the same as the last attack.
The cost of this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is reduced by −1 for every 4 stacks of versatility.
9f3d51a6-e08a-4d4f-ac78-d9c3f8298082: Any of the Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}, both {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g}, reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} of all the enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by −2 and their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −7% until the end of combat. Does not stack.
a9a358bc-a3d2-4e69-8583-f7671973095d:
The Arch-Militant makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} with a kick, dealing {uip|Damage|22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} instead of weapon damage. This attack does not count toward the attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} and counts as a single melee attack for the purposes of versatility.
This attack cannot be parried and will {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} the target 2 cells away.
b32b11b1-65b1-4314-abdc-1d19d5bc10b0: The first time every combat that the Arch-Militant reaches 0 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} while under the effect of Steady Superiority or Heroic Sacrifice, the Arch-Militant restores 20% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} and loses this effect.
b5f8f092-6167-46be-bd3c-0774ffd0c8bd: The Arch-Militant can use two-handed {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons within {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} but with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.
ba1d3495-b424-4253-8c6e-d8a6359bceb4: Any {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} area and {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks of the Arch-Militant reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} of all enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by −10 until the end of combat. Does not stack.
c0a5955e-e6ee-410b-a9a8-be9de75aaa11: Until the end of combat, the Arch-Militant can make one additional attack with each of their weapon sets. Also, the Arch-Militant restores all their {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g}.
cc5c1c49-32cc-4133-9f3b-0462613a27a5:
The Arch-Militant's next attack, if it {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, will cause all the targets to make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fe85384efebb4d38b71738594746e413} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. If failed, the targets will suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} based on the attack's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} type:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Impact damage{/g} knocks the target {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Piercing and {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} on the target until the end of combat.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:DamageTypes}Energy{/g} and all other damage inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} on the target until the end of combat.</indent>
Power swords and power axes count as both energy and rending, while power hammers count as both energy and impact. Attacks that combine several types of damage will benefit from each additional effect.
d175980a-4ea0-4ac5-91d1-30abf3a043c7: Until the end of combat, every attack grants a stacking +2% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}.
d323c601-19d2-49d1-b5b9-5def858a0717: When entering combat the Arch-Militant gains +{uip|WeaponSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, and +{uip|BallisticSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} until end of combat.
d5057203-3a05-439f-a1ba-4fffbaefa8e1: The Arch-Militant gains +1 stack of versatility whenever an ally grants the Arch-Militant an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}.
ea0b8977-468e-4649-aeaa-caa4e1eb8285: As long as the Arch-Militant has stacks of versatility, Reckless Rush costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g}.
fe58f8bd-fb4e-4ba7-8231-10b3dd695f5a: While under the effect of Confident Approach, the Arch-Militant keeps half of the usual {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} from versatility.
